product_name: Gracie by Soybu Aimee Hoodie - Girls'
long_description: With a full-length zipper, luxurious banding at cuffs and hem and deep angled pockets, the girls' Gracie by Soybu Aimee Hoodie is perfect after sports or to take the chill out of cool summer evenings. Soft jersey fabric is made from 65% polyester and 35% rayon.
short_description: With a full-length zipper, luxurious banding at cuffs and hem and deep angled pockets, the girls' Gracie by Soybu Aimee Hoodie is perfect after sports or to take the chill out of cool summer evenings.
